title: When is the next teaser of new champion and Urgot  and Evelyn rework? i cannot wait anymore!
body:

replies.body:
1. Let's say it does take Riot 2-3 months to make a champion... *they just released TWO* a short while ago. At least give them some more time. 

2. I'm pretty sure there are already some item icon changes on the PBE (i.e. GA). 

3. Ryze recently had a rework.

1. There's been a small teaser for a new champion, apparently similar to Akali and Diana but with Lightning powers. But this has been denied by Rioters.
2. Why did you put Protobelt and Raptor Cloak in there? Both pretty new items. Anyway, they chose not to update all icons at once to limit the amount of confusion, personally not too sure how much it affects anyone but whatever.
3. There is an actual Upcoming Changes page https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202294884-Champion-Update-Schedule. It hasn't got too much detail in it though. Urgot and Eve are getting full-scale reworks, as you know, some of the ones you've put up on the list have had minor reworks just to make them a bit better (E.g. Amumu and Udyr)
4. They have already stated that they're going to be replacing the mouse cursor, doesn't seem to be high on their priority list as it's not that impactful
Yeah hurry the fuck up with an urgot teaser already. Fuck evelyn and a new champ.
